heroTitle: We design and deploy specialized AI agents for real work.
heroLede: Not general-purpose chatbots. Archon builds agents with clear roles, guardrails, and outcomes. We help organizations move from experimentation to structured, governable AI systems.
pillar1Copy: Clear roles, safe operations, measurable outcomes.
pillar2Copy: Frameworks, evaluation, and governance baked in.
pillar3Copy: Systems thinking for scaling and simulation.
intro1Copy: An AI firm focused on specialized agents. We ship agents, the frameworks that power them, and the playbooks to run them safely.
intro2Copy: Agents turn AI into clear roles: tutors, interviewers, reviewers. With defined scope, you can measure outcomes and earn trust from teams.
intro3Copy: We design for governance from day one. Every agent ships with constraints, evaluation loops, and integration paths instead of ad-hoc prompts.
whyPara1: Intelligence scales better when responsibility is narrow. Specialized agents have a clear role, operate within defined constraints, and are easier to evaluate, improve, and trust.
whyPara2: Generalist systems try to do everything; they become unpredictable, harder to govern, and break accountability. Clarity beats cleverness in production systems.
productsSubhead: Ready-to-ship agents with clear roles, plus room for new specialties.
product1Copy: Structured, subject-specific learning companions that guide teams through new material. Tutor agents run scoped drills, track progress, and deliver measurable learning at scale.
product2Copy: Conduct structured interviews with constraints, role-specific checklists, and scoring logic. Use them to explore strategy options, audit operations, and standardize evaluations.
product3Copy: A growing catalog: onboarding coaches, QA reviewers, operations copilots. Built on the same framework so new roles launch quickly and stay governable.
frameworkItem1Copy: Break large problems into smaller agent roles with clear responsibilities and constraints.
frameworkItem2Copy: Make systems transparent and governable. Reduce risk when deploying AI into real workflows.
frameworkItem3Copy: Scale systems intentionally instead of building fragile monoliths. Frameworks turn AI experimentation into operational systems.
frameworkWhoCopy: Product leads, ops teams, and builders who need reliability over novelty.
frameworkHowCopy: Fewer moving parts, clearer handoffs, and faster compliance reviews.
frameworkDiagramHint: A simple path: break work into roles, validate fast, then expand with safety.
servicesSubhead: Consulting, integration, and implementation for organizations that want agents that stay reliable.
service1Copy: Workshops to choose the right agent roles, craft constraints, and set success metrics before any code is written.
service2Copy: Connect agents to data, tools, and workflows. We add observability and evaluation so they improve safely.
service3Copy: Build-versus-buy decisions, governance patterns, and implementation support for teams moving from MVP to production.
ctaEyebrow: Ready to design your first agent?
ctaHeading: Move from experimentation to structured, governable AI systems.
ctaBody: Tell us what you need. We'll share a simple plan and a safe starting pilot.
